ygData.subject: Re: level of evil eyes in runnyeye
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFL!  Whoops ... From: Trizzen Do Trevan To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 9:53 AM Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] level of evil
ygData.messageBody:
ROFL! Whoops

----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 9:53 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] level of evil eyes in runnyeye


You all are talking about two separate things. Broxx,
lords and normal low 20's evil eyes are in the gorge
of the minotaur. The evil eye that killed you is in
the basement of the castle of clan runnyeye which is a
zone adjacent to the gorge. The evil eyes in runny are
mid 30's wizards, whilke the evil eyes in gorge are
very low 20s enchanters.

Borxx spawns on one side of runnyeye and a normal
wizard eye spawns on the other. Borxx is 37ish, while
them normal one is 32ish. Could be a bit off on the
levels.

Darkmoon


> I'm sure it wasn't borxx, i looked at the target
> name when it hit me and it
> said evil eye. Now I have got to go back and kick
> his big eye in!!!
>

> >Which evil eye was it? At 29th, I could solo them
> with my pet. And close
> >without. They were almost always green to me,
> except the Lords. They were
> >barely blue. All you need to cast to kill it is
> your DD spell twice. The
> >only thing is, they like to knock you back with
> their spells, effectively
> >interupting your spell. If it was the King, then
> I'm not sure. Didn't see
> >him spawn while I was there.
> >
> >In a group of 3 I know that lvl 20's can take them
> out. The only real
> >danger is if they concentrate on one. They have
> pretty hefty DD spells,
> and
> >the Lords love to charm (resisted 3 of them while
> my pet beat them down).
> >
